description._content: Description: Coal Hydrogenation Plant --- Fushun, Manchuria. Photographed by U.S. Signal Corps, 17 June 1946. Machine shop from which all machine tools had been removed during Soviet occupancy. The remainder of the plant was devoid of control instruments but other machinery remainded. Location: Fushun, China Date: 17 June 1946 ------------------------------------------------------ Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/441. This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons. Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
